snippet: Nothing the Germans do any more will be surprising. They have run out of red herrings and false alarms. Nearly all possible changes have been rung on the strategy of the sudden pounce when no move is expected and of holding everything when the vic...
lead_paragraph: Nothing the Germans do any more will be surprising. They have run out of red herrings and false alarms. Nearly all possible changes have been rung on the strategy of the sudden pounce when no move is expected and of holding everything when the victim is braced for instant attack.
